headline: Assessing Nucor’s (NUE) Valuation After Buffett-Style Attention And US Infrastructure Tailwinds
summary: Nucor highlighted through Buffett-style investing lens Recent commentary pointed to Nucor (NUE) as a business that appears to fit Warren Buffett’s two step stock picking test, and also tied its prospects to continued U.S. infrastructure spending. See our latest analysis for Nucor. Nucor’s recent mention in a Buffett-style framework comes after a strong run, with a 90 day share price return of 21.97% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 40.89%, although the year to date share price return...
